Instance Method# setFailureType(to:)

iOS 13.0+iPadOS 13.0+Mac Catalyst 13.0+macOS 10.15+tvOS 13.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 6.0+

```
func setFailureType<E>(to error: E.Type) -> Publishers.Sequence<Elements, E> where E : Error
```

Available when `Elements` conforms to `Sequence` and `Failure` conforms to `Error`.## [See Also](/documentation/Combine/Publishers/Sequence/setFailureType(to:)#see-also)
